name: From the Blender: The Virtuous Mary
description: We tend to associate the word "smoothie" with sweet beverages, but savory smoothies like this one are among my favorites. One step beyond a Virgin Mary, this Mary is virtuous because it includes whole celery stalks and tomatoes.
recipeIngredient: 2 tender inner stalks celery with leaves, chopped
1/2 teaspoon prepared or fresh grated horseradish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in blender and puree until completely smooth. Divide between two glasses and serve immediately.
